name: Nyasha Winter
description: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2 GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 Gb DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 Gb DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
